_header: He that made this book I pray God save his life
Subjects: prayers, asked on behalf of scribes
_description: Prayer for the scribe — one couplet

HunHM139.Transcription:
He þat made thys boke I pray gode saue hys lyfeAnd also hys
                    wyttes ffyue
HunHM139.Note:
Added to originally blank leaf by a hand of the sixteenth century,
                    possibly that of John Wyldon, who signs his name on this page.
